items.sentence: Tom was afraid that he was going to look stupid if he asked a question.
Tom was looking at the pictures that Mary took when I entered the room.
What are some of the differences between a dictatorship and a monarchy?
I can\'t afford to eat at this restaurant, so let\'s go somewhere else.
Tom and Mary used to live in the house that John and Alice live in now.
Tom assured me that everything would be ready by the time we got there.
Tom was scared to ask questions because he didn\'t want to look stupid.
Tom, if you\'re not too busy, could you come to my office for a minute?
Tom and Mary celebrated their 30th wedding anniversary on October 20th.
I wonder if we\'ll have enough money to buy Tom the painting he wanted.
